sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there are only two dwarves jousting. They ride live animals, a dog and a sow. Their real names are revealed in ''A Dance with Dragons''.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
A [[Dwarfism|dwarf]], he makes a living by performing for other peoples' amusement.

===[[Season 4]]===
Along with a group of other dwarfs, he takes part in a mock "reenactment" of the [[War of the Five Kings]] at [[Purple Wedding|King Joffrey's wedding]]. He dresses as [[Balon Greyjoy]] and rides a [[kraken]].<ref>"[[The Lion and the Rose]]"</ref>
